metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12418 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: When Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.28, 8.5.0 to 8.5.47, 7.0.0 and 7.0.97 isconfigured with the JMX Remote Lifecycle Listener, a local attacker withoutaccess to the Tomcat process or configuration files is able to manipulatethe RMI registry to perform a man-in-the-middle attack to capture usernames and passwords used to access the JMX interface. The attacker can thenuse these credentials to access the JMX interface and gain complete controlover the Tomcat instance.

criterions.comment: tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tomcat9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
